Data: {"recipient_id": "cce2a5b7-7536-4111-8c1c-1525b2d6bb0a", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hello, do I have an account manager assigned?

Hi Wayne! At the moment, dedicated account management is reserved for advertisers who meet a daily spend threshold of $1,000 or more. If you’re not at that level yet, our self-serve platform has everything you need to launch and optimize your campaigns successfully. If you believe you meet the criteria, please let me know and I can guide you on how to proceed.
Yes

Great! To proceed, please upload a media plan, billing statement, or screenshot showing a daily ad spend of $1,000 or more. Once verified, we’ll be happy to assist with your onboarding and connect you with a dedicated account manager. While you wait, feel free to browse our Help Center for answers to frequently asked questions.

Thank you for providing the screenshot of your ad management dashboard. It shows a total spend of $1,374.16 across your campaigns, with several active campaigns listed.

To move forward and assign an account manager, please confirm the following:

1. Your total daily spend exceeds $1,000.
2. You're interested in receiving direct assistance and guidance.

If both are true, we’ll start the process of connecting you with a dedicated account manager.

Thank you for sharing the details! Since your total daily spend exceeds $1,000 and you're interested in receiving direct assistance, we'll begin the process of connecting you with a dedicated account manager. Please ensure that you've uploaded the necessary documentation, such as a media plan or billing statement, to verify your spend. We'll reach out to you soon with more information.
Ok thanks, I will wait for the email
You're welcome, Wayne! We'll be in touch soon. If you have any other questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
Thank you for your feedback. You can click the close icon below to close this widget.
Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
Invalid operation. Please reach out to your Account Manager for more information if it persists. Thank you!

It seems like there might be an issue with the operation you're trying to perform. If you continue to experience problems, please reach out to your Account Manager for further assistance. If you don't have one yet, feel free to contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for help.
trying to set up a new pixel, but this keeps happening. why?

I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble setting up a new pixel. Could you let me know which platform or service you're using for the pixel integration? This will help me provide more specific guidance.
with newsbreak
your platform

Thanks for letting me know you're using NewsBreak. If you're trying to set up a pixel, you might find this guide helpful: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). If you're using a different platform, please let me know so I can provide the correct instructions.

Thanks for the info! To set up a NewsBreak Pixel, you'll need to follow these steps:

1. Log into your NewsBreak account and navigate to Tools > Ad Manager > Event Management.
2. Choose 'Pixel' as your tracking type and specify your integration method and event type.
3. Locate your base code in Step 1 and copy it.
4. Embed the JavaScript code snippet on your website to collect data on specific conversion events.
5. Once integrated, test it in Ad Manager or inform your account manager/operations team for verification.

For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify).

If you encounter any issues during the setup, feel free to reach out for further assistance!
yes test conversion is complete, but can't save now

If you've completed the test conversion but are unable to save, there might be a few things to check:

1. Ensure that all required fields in the setup are filled out correctly.
2. Double-check your internet connection to ensure it's stable.
3. Try clearing your browser cache or using a different browser to see if that resolves the issue.

If these steps don't help, please reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
